ygData.subject: Re: Can a cleric solo to 50?
ygData.msgSnippet: Drago, What type of armor do you use, if i may ask... Sianne Xegony
ygData.messageBody:
Drago,

What type of armor do you use, if i may ask...

Sianne
Xegony


>From: "Cliff, Monty" <mcliff@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Can a cleric solo to 50?
>Date: Tue, 16 Nov 1999 14:01:08 -0500
>
>
>I think pretty much any class could solo to level 50 if you didn't mind the
>down
>times (except mabye rogues). I'm not sure why anyone would want to though
>as it
>would get very boring.
>
>A cleric would have to stick to undead most of the time as our live dd
>spells
>are really bad, especially in the low 40's when your still useing wrath. I
>didn't personally solo at all until I hit level 47 when I could pull
>spectres
>solo so really don't know what i'm talking about :)
>
>As for the cleric armor, the only quest I have done is the weapon. Imo the
>quest armor isn't very good at all and not worth the time or money it takes
>to
>get it, but that's just my opinion.
>
>Drogo DarkBane
>L50 Halfling Cleric
>The Rathe
>
>P.S. Halflings look good in purple :)
>
><< text3.html >>
